column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Bright and airy
column2: great coffee. Lots of Beautiful People
column3: which can be a little intimidating
column4: but the staff doesn't put on airs
column5: which I appreciate. I love their brunch / lunch menu
column6: but more than once have forgotten that they stop serving that at a certain time and switch to just-coffee-bar-and-pastries/desserts. Best place in Houston for pastries
